title: Matheran
subtitle: Asia’s Only Automobile-Free Hill Station
overview: Matheran is a quaint and eco-sensitive hill station located in the Western Ghats of Maharashtra. Perched at 800 meters above sea level, it offers breathtaking views, red mud pathways, and serene forests.
It is uniquely known for being Asia's only automobile-free hill station—no cars are allowed inside, preserving its peaceful atmosphere and clean air.
Visitors can explore Matheran on foot or horseback, making it ideal for a calm, nostalgic getaway close to Mumbai and Pune.

highlights.title: No Vehicles Allowed
highlights.description: A pollution-free destination with no motor vehicles inside the town.

highlights.title: Horse Rides
highlights.description: Enjoy rides across scenic viewpoints and forest trails.

highlights.title: Forest Trails
highlights.description: Lush green woods perfect for walking, birdwatching, and meditation.

highlights.title: Toy Train
highlights.description: The heritage Neral–Matheran toy train offers a nostalgic experience.

geography.intro: Matheran lies in the Raigad district, part of the Sahyadri range. With over 38 viewpoints, it offers stunning vistas of valleys and hills.

climate.description: Matheran enjoys pleasant weather year-round. Summers are cool, monsoons are green and misty, and winters are crisp.

geography.conclusion: Its pollution-free status and scenic viewpoints make it a favorite for trekkers, couples, and eco-tourists.

activities.title: Viewpoint Hiking
activities.description: Explore famous points like Panorama, Echo, and Louisa Point.
info: Sunrise and sunset are most scenic

activities.title: Horseback Riding
activities.description: Popular and fun way to explore the forested trails.
info: Hire local guides near the main market

activities.title: Photography
activities.description: Capture misty landscapes, monkeys, and forest paths.
info: Be cautious with gear during rain

activities.title: Local Market Walk
activities.description: Explore shops selling leather goods, honey, chikki, and handicrafts.

attractions.title: Panorama Point
attractions.description: Gives a 360-degree view of the Western Ghats and breathtaking sunrises.

attractions.title: Louisa Point
attractions.description: Offers a direct view of the Prabal Fort and waterfalls during monsoon.

attractions.title: Charlotte Lake
attractions.description: Main water source surrounded by dense forests and quiet picnic spots.

attractions.title: One Tree Hill
attractions.description: A scenic hill with only one tree visible at the top.

marineLife.intro: Being a hill station, Matheran doesn’t feature marine life. However, its forest ecosystem is rich in fauna and flora.

items.title: Birdwatching
items.description: Home to bulbuls, hornbills, and woodpeckers.

items.title: Wildlife
items.description: Monkeys, civets, and small mammals often spotted.

items.title: Botanical Life
items.description: Evergreen forests with herbs, bamboo, and wildflowers.

conclusion: Matheran’s biodiversity makes it ideal for nature lovers and wildlife photographers.
Its quiet natural environment supports ecotourism.

howToReach.title: By Train
details: Reach Neral station from Mumbai or Pune.
Take toy train (seasonal) or shared taxis to Dasturi Point.

howToReach.title: By Road
details: Drive or take taxi till Dasturi Car Park
From there, walk or ride a horse into Matheran

bookingTips.description: Book resorts near main market or viewpoints
Avoid heavy monsoon if you dislike trekking in rain
Cars not allowed — pack accordingly for walking/horses
